description:
《英文天天写》是沪江部落一档写作类节目，其目的在于提升大家的英语写作能力。每期节目主持人都会给出一个话题，积极参加的童鞋还会得到主持人的专业点评哦！想提高英语写作的童鞋千万不要错过哦！去沪江部落订阅本节目！

话题：

Creative Writing: imagine a scenario

The dance showed great movements and rhythm. Was it performed by one person, two people, or a group of people? What kind of dance was it? What was the situation?
This week's topic: The dance was truly impressive... (90-110 words) 

范例1：

Back in his apartment, Hodge cleaned himself up and sat on the sofa. He stared at a painting hanging on his wall: an abstract piece of different shades of purple and rays of light surrounding a dancing figure in the middle. His phone started to vibrate on the coffee table. Hodge reported to his boss that the transaction went well, and that although there were minor complications at the end, everything was handled. The computer-generated voice on the line seemed satisfied. Hodge, however, did not mention the two unknown characters he encountered. He needed to do some investigations first.

想要得到专业主持人的点评和意见吗？快来节目现场一试身手吧>>
